name: Boulder County Nature Association
description: BCNA aims to study and conserve the resilient natural ecosystems of Boulder County and adjacent areas of the Colorado Front Range. We will help them categorize information around the countless species of local wildlife.

name: One Colorado
description: One Colorado works to improve the lives of LGBTQ Coloradans through public education and advocacy. We will be building a legislation tracker among other features for their website.

name: Big City Mountaineers
description: Big City Mountaineers provides transformative experiences through connections to nature that strengthen life skills and build a community for the youth. We will be automating parts of their workflow so more time can be spent on hiking the great outdoors.

name: Portland Indigenous Marketplace
description: Indigenous Marketplace supports Indigenous artists and entrepreneurs by providing barrier-free, culturally respectful spaces. Our technology will assist them with keeping track of vendor information across their events.

name: Colorado Plateau Foundation
description: CPF invests in Native-led organizations that help preserve natural resources across the Colorado Plateau. The interactive map that we build will help highlight Indigenous communities across this region.
